item.title: Benchmarking Go, Crystal, Python and JavaScript
item.description: Benford’s Law After watching a Netflix documentary about Benford’s Law (“connected” Season 1 Episode 4 “Digits”), I got really interested in it because it can help detect fraud in e.g. balance sheets. So I searched my favorite programming languages and detected that there is no npm Package for checking Benford’s Law. Sooo … Long story short: I created nearly identical libraries for doing a Benford’s Law check in JavaScript, Go and Crystal.
